StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetNROTCPreShipView]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @NROTC int, @SortBy nvarchar(50), @StartRow int, @PageSize int
AS
CREATE TABLE #O.cerPreShipPreSortTable (PersonId int ,NwaId int ,ContractId int ,ApplicantName varchar(62) ,Ssn varchar(9) ,OssId int ,OssName varchar(45) ,Gender char(1) ,ContractBeginDate date.me ,Class varchar(7) ,Increment int ,ComponentCode varchar(2) ,Program varchar(50) ,P.Date date.me ,P.RunMinutes int ,P.RunSeconds int ,P.PullupsHang int ,P.Pullups int ,P.Pushups int ,P.Crunches int ,P.PlankMinutes int ,P.PlankSeconds int ,P.Score int ,StatusDisposi.on varchar(255))
INSERT INTO #O.cerPreShipPreSortTable
SELECT P.PERSON_ID, N.NWA_ID, C.CONTRACT_ID, P.LAST_NAME + ', ' + P.FIRST_NAME + COALESCE(SPACE(1) + P.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME, SPACE(0)) AS APPLICANT_NAME, P.SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER AS SSN, OSS.ORGANIZATION_ID AS OSS_ID, OSS.NAME AS OSS_NAME, COALESCE(MC.GENDER_CODE, SPACE(0)) AS GENDER, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(6), C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, 12), SPACE(0)) AS CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE, OC.TRAINING_TYPE_CODE AS CLASS, OC.CLASS_NUMBER AS INCREMENT, CC.COMPONENT_CODE AS ComponentCode, COALESCE(CC.COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION, SPACE(0)) AS PROGRAM, COALESCE(CONVERT(CHAR(6), PFT.PFT_DATE, 12), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_DATE, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), PFT.PFT_RUN_MINUTES), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_RUN_MINUTES, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), PFT.PFT_RUN_SECONDS), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_RUN_SECONDS, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), CASE MC.GENDER_CODE WHEN 'M' THEN PFT.PFT_PULLUPS WHEN 'F' THEN PFT.PFT_HANG END), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_PULLUPS_HANG, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), PFT.PFT_PULLUPS), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_PULLUPS, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(3), PFT.PFT_PUSHUPS), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_PUSHUPS, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(3), PFT.PFT_CRUNCHES), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_CRUNCHES, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), PFT.PFT_PLANK_MINUTES), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_PLANK_MINUTES, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(2), PFT.PFT_PLANK_SECONDS), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_PLANK_SECONDS, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(3), PFT.PFT_SCORE), SPACE(0)) AS PFT_SCORE, SD.STATUS_DESCRIPTION + '/' + SD.DISPOSITION_DESCRIPTION AS STATUS_DISPOSITION
FROM OFFICER_CONTRACT C WITH (NOLOCK) INNER JOIN NWA N ON (C.NWA_ID = N.NWA_ID AND C.CONTRACT_BEGIN_DATE BETWEEN @FromDate AND @ToDate) INNER JOIN MARINE_CANDIDATE MC ON (N.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID AND N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = @NROTC) INNER JOIN PERSON P ON MC.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = P.PERSON_ID INNER JOIN CANDIDATE_STATUS CS ON (N.NWA_ID = CS.NWA_ID AND CS.STATUS_TYPE = 'O' AND CS.STATUS_CODE = 'F' AND CS.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = dbo.GetMaxStatusID(CS.NWA_ID)) INNER JOIN STATUS_DISPOSITION SD ON (CS.STATUS_TYPE = SD.STATUS_TYPE AND CS.STATUS_CODE = SD.STATUS_CODE AND CS.DISPOSITION_CODE = SD.DISPOSITION_CODE) INNER JOIN RECRUITING_ORGANIZATION OSS ON N.ORGANIZATION_OF_RECORD_ID = OSS.ORGANIZATION_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN PFT ON (N.NWA_ID = PFT.NWA_ID AND PFT.PFT_ID = dbo.GetMaxPFTID(N.NWA_ID)) LEFT OUTER JOIN OCS ON (C.NWA_ID = OCS.NWA_ID AND OCS.OCS_ID = dbo.GetMaxOCSID(OCS.NWA_ID, 'Y')) LEFT OUTER JOIN OCS_CLASS OC ON OCS.OCS_CLASS_ID = OC.CLASS_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN COMPONENT_CODE CC ON OCS.COMPONENT_CODE = CC.COMPONENT_CODE
DECLARE @Query nvarchar(4000) SET @Query = N'SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (Order By ' + @SortBy + ') AS RowNumber, * FROM #O.cerPreShipPreSortTable ORDER BY ' + @SortBy
DECLARE @SortTable TABLE (RowNumber int ,PersonId int ,NwaId int ,ContractId int ,ApplicantName varchar(62) ,Ssn varchar(9) ,OssId int ,OssName varchar(45) ,Gender char(1) ,ContractBeginDate date.me ,Class varchar(7) ,Increment int ,ComponentCode varchar(2) ,Program varchar(50) ,P.Date date.me ,P.RunMinutes int ,P.RunSeconds int ,P.PullupsHang int ,P.Pullups int ,P.Pushups int ,P.Crunches int ,P.PlankMinutes int ,P.PlankSeconds int ,P.Score int ,StatusDisposi.on varchar(255))
INSERT INTO @SortTable EXECUTE sp_executesql @Query--, N'@FromDate date.me, @ToDate date.me, @OSS int', @FromDate, @ToDate, @OSS
DECLARE @LastRow int SET @LastRow = @StartRow + @PageSize
SELECT * FROM @SortTable WHERE RowNumber >= @StartRow AND RowNumber <= @LastRow
SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @SortTable) AS Total, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @SortTable WHERE ComponentCode IN ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', 'AD') AND Gender = 'M') AS PlcMales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @SortTable WHERE ComponentCode IN ('0A', '0B', '0C', '0E', 'AD') AND Gender = 'F') AS PlcFemales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @SortTable WHERE ComponentCode IN ('1A', '1B', '1C', '1E', '1H') AND Gender = 'M') AS OccMales, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM @SortTable WHERE ComponentCode IN ('1A', '1B', '1C', '1E', '1H') AND Gender = 'F') AS OccFemales DROP TABLE #O.cerPreShipPreSortTable
